name: Printstop
description: At PrintStop, with a 17-year legacy, we’re changing the narrative of workplace experiences at small to medium enterprises by transforming the printing & customised gifting procurement processes. Our centralised, state-of-the-art online platform offers over 500 products with personalisation and customisation options across 100+ categories with a minimum order size of just one. With thousands of happy customers, an average rating of 4.5 reflects our unwavering commitment to quality and service.
features: We have more than 200 print products for your brand.
Your own designs will be made available in your account in an editable format.
We also have Pehchaan, our in-house design team to help you create stirring designs as per your requirements.
Headline: Bringing your gifting and customised printing ideas to life!
ShortDescription: PrintStop simplifies the complex print procurement, making it easy and hassle-free!

Highlights.name: Ready-to-use designs
Highlights.description: PrintStop offers 100s of ready-to-use designs which can be easily customised to your needs.

Highlights.name: Accessibility
Highlights.description: Order from your office desk or your living room anytime and get your products delivered anywhere in India or 50+ countries.

Highlights.name: Technology
Highlights.description: PrintStop tries to leverage technology to make printing easy. We have launched two solutions.

enhanced_description: PrintStop, leveraging a 17-year legacy since its launch in 2007, transforms print and customized gifting procurement processes for small to medium enterprises. Their centralized, state-of-the-art online platform simplifies complex procurement, making it easy and hassle-free. It features over 500 products, including more than 200 print products, across 100+ categories, offering extensive personalization and customisation options with a minimum order size of just one. PrintStop provides access to hundreds of ready-to-use designs and offers an in-house design team, 'Pehchaan', to assist with bespoke design creation. Customers can manage their own designs in an editable format within their account. Accessible from anywhere, products can be delivered across India and to over 50 countries, reflecting PrintStop's commitment to quality and service, evidenced by thousands of happy customers and an average rating of 4.5. The company aims to improve employee happiness and engagement through its offerings.
key_use_cases: Streamlining and transforming print procurement processes for businesses
Procuring customized corporate gifts for employee engagement and other needs
Creating and managing brand-specific print products and merchandise
Accessing professional design services for custom print and gift items
Ordering personalized products with low minimum quantities (down to one item)
Global procurement and delivery of print and customized gifting products
competitive_advantages: 17-year legacy and experience in the industry
Centralized, state-of-the-art online platform for procurement
Extensive product catalog with over 500 products across 100+ categories
Flexibility with a minimum order size of just one unit
In-house design team ('Pehchaan') for custom design support
Customer's own designs available in editable format within their account
Global delivery capabilities to India and over 50 countries
High customer satisfaction reflected by a 4.5 average rating
Focus on simplifying complex print procurement processes
implementation_scenarios: Cloud-based/SaaS direct procurement solution for businesses
hr_functions_supported: Employee Experience (through customized gifting for engagement)
HR Operations (for managing corporate gifting programs)
roi_benefits: Increased efficiency in print and gifting procurement processes
Reduced complexity and hassle in acquiring custom products
Enhanced employee happiness and engagement through targeted gifting programs
Cost optimization by allowing small order quantities (minimum of one)
Convenience and time-saving through an accessible online platform and global delivery
primary_users: Small to Medium Enterprise Business Owners
